content: Investments Asked by Sze JieAsked 3w agoWhat will happen if we are absent for Extraordinary General Meeting?Will our shares be affected?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered 3w agoNope, you will still hold on to your shareholdings. Just that you can't exercise your right to vote on the matters in the agenda if you are absent unless you appoint a proxy.0 comments1
